# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new spherical coordinates structure from the specified Cartesian coordinates represented by a Spatial vector.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ vector: Vector3DFloat)
```

## Parameters

- **vector**: The Cartesian coordinates.
title: init(_:)
